data.title: Register of Certificate Holders
data.text:
We are delighted to announce the launch of the new ISVPS Nurse Certificate (NCert) in Feline Nursing, which is also available as a Veterinary Technician Certificate (VTCert) and a Veterinary Paraprofessional Certificate (VPPCert). The qualification has been designed...

Congratulations to Georgia Stone, ISVPS Academic and Partnerships Manager, on achieving her Postgraduate Advanced Certificate in Educational Studies: Educational Assessment from the University of Cambridge (in association with Cambridge Assessment). Over 15 months...

We are delighted to be working with the ESCMID Study Group for Veterinary Microbiology (ESGVM) to highlight the importance of antimicrobial stewardship by accrediting their upcoming course, Emerging laboratory and point-of-care technologies for detection of AMR and...
